11131.content:
As Asriel slowly lumbered toward his breakfast, Toriel couldn't help but reflect on how astonishingly effective her hubby's new ordinance had been doing. Ever since the war, the underground had been trying to recuperate, but nothing seemed to work until Dr. Gaster had formed a very special magical farming technique that made plants produce more than four times their natural production rate giving us more food than we could ever need. This amazing gift that Dr. Gaster gave the kingdom gave Asgore the best idea to raise the people's spirits. A never-ending feast, a festival celebrated by the entire underground where they could let loose and enjoy themselves. Oh, and enjoy themselves they did, feasting upon our now neverending resource. But the most important thing this new magic food gave us was that it had two very accidental but very appreciated side effects. One was exponential fat growth, but the other was that it altered our minds that it no longer mattered. It fed us thoughts like, "Who needs the surface I have everything I need here," or "All this extra weight feels so good. I need more of it." And so it goes ever since then, exercise and health foods have been outlawed, and the entire underground ballooned on deserts and meats, but none have grown quicker than the Dreemurr Family.

This was self-evident just by looking at the three. Asgore, who feasted the most at the festivals in Snowdin, grew immobile in only a few short days. Being forced to live at the table 24/7 not that he minds at all. He gets to be the center of attention at the neverending party. He has even been getting fed while asleep by some very enthusiastic townsfolk. Toriel, however, was a lot smaller than Asgore, but if you compared her to a picture taken only a month ago you would hardly believe it to be the same person. Gone was her svelte figure, her stomach hung down halfway of her meaty legs creating a table whenever she sat. As well as flabby arms that somehow defied gravity while cooking. Because despite her slow labored movement the rest of the days, whenever she cooked she gained the reflexes of a ninja, being able to focus on preparing twelve dishes at a time. While still cooking every last one to perfection for her son. And this brings us to Asriel, who like his father grew a lot faster than his mother. But unlike his father who developed a love of fat for the sake of his subjects and their happiness. Toriel seemed to have trained him from birth in preparation for Gaster's breakthrough.

This rumor was ridiculous of course because Toriel had no knowledge of Gaster's testing until he gained the results he needed, but many wondered why Toriel spoiled him so much even before every child was given the opportunity to drop school and glut on nothing but deserts. But despite what many rumors or theories would suggest the reason why Toriel spoiled him so much was quite simple. It was because she never wanted her son to feel want, unhappiness, or pain. He wanted to eat nothing but sweets, done. He didn't want to go to school anymore, done. He wanted to just be a lazy lump eating and playing video games, done. He was given anything and everything he could ever wish for. And with Gaster's invention, the spoiling increased 10-fold now that the royal family didn't have to retain any modicum of appearances. And now he stands before his mother. Just one short month after Gaster's revelation.

His sweater stretched thin over his body looking more like a bra than a shirt with his large gut hanging down to his knees. His pants beaking at the seems barely covering his bubble butt, with his underwear being similarly stretched thin exposing just how gargantuan he became with his comparatively small stature. He could still waddle, but just barely, it was quite obvious that immobility was only a few short days of feasting, and gaining away. He would lucky to still have a week of walking left. His eyes shone out pure joy at the world, a disposition of a truly innocent child, who has seen no sorrow in his life and can only be happy. He struggled to walk to his seat at the table where he asked the question, "So what's for breakfast today?"
11131.title: Another Morning in the Dreemurr Household

choices: 3 large cookie cakes one for each
111312.content:
However before she could tell Azzy about all twelve full-sized meals they were about to eat, a knock they were both expecting sounded at the door. "Ah I was worried that he would arrive late, but it seems he is just on time," Toriel said. She slowly lumbered up to the door pretty tired from all the cooking she had to do. She opened the door to see three rather portly figures outside their home in New Home, the figures were Jackson, Andrew, and Kid. Jackson and Andrew were two Bunnyman native to Snowdin who got married and adopted Kid as their son (they both had pure white fur, and matching plaid button-up shirts. Red for Jackson and Blue for Andrew. They also wore blue jeans that looked skin tight and would break at any moment.) Kid, however, was a small lizard child without arms who was native to Hotland, but now lives with his two dads in Snowdin, he also became fast friends with Asriel back when Asriel still went to school. The three were rather chubby, but the fattest of the three was definitely Kid (at least when you compared his heft to his short stature. He wore a striped sweater that rode up to above his naval but stayed below his prominent chest. He also wore brown pants that were already torn in several places and stayed unbuttoned to let his jiggly gut muffin-top in complete comfort.) This was most likely due to Azzy rubbing off on him rather than any gluttonous tendencies, not that Kid minded the extra weight, but he was nowhere near Azzy's heft. "Thanks for taking care of Kid for the weekend, we really need some alone time after all the paperwork of taking Kid out of School and quitting our jobs," Andrew said.

Ah yes, with the new breakthrough money, and education became obsolete. After all, no one needed to work to put food on the table, and housing has never needed to be paid for, due to the benevolence of the Dreemurrs, so many are leaving work, or school to live lives of gluttony and hedonism. So most shops have closed down, and gold is only useful to the dragons that survived the war, but hey no one needs to sustain commerce anymore so why worry about it. Though some remain steadfast in not joining the festivities, but those cases are mostly just due to worry of what comes when new houses need to be built, or worry of what happens when the core isn't maintained. However, in a few short months, Gaster will have the entire underground fully automated, All heavy labor going to robots while the monsters live carefree days. Growing fat and lazy without a care in the world.

But back to the situation at hand, "Oh it is no issue, but I bet you would have taken me up on my offer sooner if you knew what was going to happen," Toriel replied to Andrew's statement. The offer she was talking about was when Asriel left school to live his spoilt life, he said he would miss being able to be by Kid's side all day, so Toriel offered to let the family live with them at the castle. Where kid could quit school without worry of the future, but the couple was hesitant to just up and leave Snowdin, but just a few short years later, and now the life offered by Tori to them became the life given to everyone, and they were eager to embrace it. "Yeah, but we would miss Snowdin to much to move here to New Home, and Azzy and Kid could still hang out on the weekends so I don't regret our decision," Jackson said.

"Yeah, but we have to go we are going to go drinking at Grillby's with a friend group, and will be feasting all day. Be good Kid don't cause to much trouble for the queen," Andrew said. "Oh, you needn't worry about his behavior, my husband has caused far more mischief than your son ever will," Tori replied. "Bye Dad, Bye Dad see you guys later," said Kid at his parents. They waved at him from the porch and started heading toward the Riverperson (one of the few who hasn't gained a single pound, but no one knows if they eat so no one questions it.) So Tori and Kid head inside.

Kid ran as fast as he could under the circumstances, but when he reached the dining room, he found that stopping while being so front heavy was nearly impossible, and with his lack of arms he tumbled to the ground. "Kid are you okay!?" exclaimed Tori. "I'm just fine your majesty my belly cushioned the blow, now where is Azzy. The two looked over at the table and found him asleep in his chair. "He must've stayed up late playing video games again," Tori said while helping the beached Kid back to his feet. "You know if we didn't have Gaster making his developments I would actually worry about how I'm raising him," Tori said while helping Kid up to a chair. "You wake him up, while I go get the food," Tori said. "You got it, your majesty," Kid replied.

"Azzy, yo Azzy wake up," Kid said in order to goad him from sleep. "Huh..." Asriel said as he slowly awakened until he realized who was in front of him that forced his mind to full awareness. "Kid, oh it's great to see you, I have the entire weekend planned out for us!" Asriel said excitedly. "Does that plan involve staying up all night playing video games, constant binging on fatty foods, and just being the incredibly lay lumps that we are," Kid replied. "Correct on three accounts, but there is more don't you worry about that, but its a surprise for now," Azzy said, "First time I'm hearing of this surprise," Tori said as she wheeled out the first course of breakfast. "Well, it wouldn't be a surprise if anyone new, but I promise it isn't anything dangerous, I have to keep my figure burning calories is a no-go," Azzy joked while playing with his fat. "Well, I won't question any further, just remember to tell me if you need me to get you out of trouble." She said as she prepared the plates. Another benefit to having Tori as a Mom, she never punished any misbehaving, just dealt with the aftermath, and letting Azzy get away with it. If he wasn't a good-natured kid this could have resulted in some serious issues, but mostly it was only minor accidents caused by over-ambitious schemes. As Tori placed down the first plate it was...

1121.content:
Scratching his eyes, Asriel got himself out of bed, his exposed belly fur moving around slightly. Looking down at his gut, he shouldn’t be surprised that he’s awake at… He squints at the clock, reading 1:49 AM…

Walking out of his room, his gut jiggling with each step downstairs he takes, Asriel goes to the kitchen to see what’ll sate his belly this time. His parents, already knowing about his large appetite, have plenty of delicious and fattening foods in stock, just as he liked it. Neither of them minded that he weighed more than he should, seeing as weight wasn't much of a problem for Goat Boss Monsters such as them.

Still, as young as he was, it's difficult for Asriel to move around very quickly, due to the heft that he always carried around. However, he managed it, no matter how difficult his life was.

Examining the contents of the kitchen, he thought of a meal he could make instead of eating something premade. It would take time to prepare, making the chance of getting caught higher, but it would be worth it. What does he do?
1121.title: Exposed Chubby Fur

11211.content:
Opening the pantry door, he looked around, grabbing a few whole boxes of sugary toaster tarts, a container of honey, a bag of brown sugar, and cinnamon.

Putting those on the table, he looks inside the fridge, pulling out some sticks of butter, a half gallon of milk, and some slices of his mother's famous Cinnamon and Butterscotch Pies.

Grabbing a large plate, Asriel quietly opened his ingredients, and got to work. He put a group of ten toaster tarts on the bottom, he lathered them in some butter, and poured some of the brown sugar on top.

Having a slice half finished in his mouth already, as well as having put another aside, Asriel begins crumbling the rest of the pie, dropping the bits all over the sticky toaster tart base, which stuck. Using honey, he glued some toaster tarts on the sides, making a box-like pastry of his own invention, it seemed.

Dropping a few spoonfuls of cinnamon into the concoction, he throws the remaining three sticks of butter, the rest of the honey, and the entire bag of brown sugar along with it. To top it all off, he seals the top with the last of the toaster tarts, already having eaten some of them.

Finally, he carefully puts his creation in the microwave, setting it for three minutes and ten seconds. While he's waiting, he scarfs down the pie he set aside, not making a single dent on his hunger. He then pours himself a glass of milk, drinking all of it before the timer ran out, and poured himself another. As the timer reaches nine, Asriel stops it before it beeps, preventing his parents from waking up and punishing him for eating at this hour. His gut rumbled for more food, the noise being muffled from all the fat on his stomach.

As he takes out what he made, he's already eating a toaster tart from the top. Grabbing a fork and knife, he cuts into what he made, finding a mixed layer of melted butter, honey, cinnamon, melted brown sugar, and small pie parts beginning to leak out from the openings. Nevertheless, he cut it into decently sized squares, and began eating quietly.

Stabbing a piece with the fork, he carefully put it into his mouth, trying to get every morsel from the square. Savoring the flavor from it, he swallows it all at once, a small bulge appearing on his throat, slowly headed towards his belly. He then sticks his fork in the next square, going with the first. The flavor wasn’t the only thing he was enjoying from his recipe. The rough from the sugar, the smooth of the honey, the solid from the toaster tart, and a unique one, that no description could do justice to his mother's pie.

Once swallowing, his belly gave off a growl, indicating that he wasn’t sated yet, much less full. He turned his attention back towards the remaining squares, counting twenty three left. Smiling to himself, he stuck gave his belly a scratch, which was rumbling for food.

On the last few pieces, his paunch was sticking out more than it already was, already having reached his fullness point. If someone were to poke it, they’d find the firmness of food inside after a few inches of squishy fat. Despite his fullness, he was resolved to finishing the whole plate of food. When the last piece was inside of him, he desired some more of the filling. Eyeing the plate, he used a spoon to put the bits that fell off into a single pile. Scooping up as much as he could, Asriel stuffed it into his mouth. Drinking another entire glass of milk, he was surprised when nothing came from the bottle. He drunk it’s entire contents unknowingly.

Asriel got up, his girth having grown quite a bit. He guessed that he had five pounds of food and milk in his stomach, digesting into more fat. Walking back up, a feat considering the amount of food he consumed, he laid in bed, letting the tiredness from digestion win, sleeping to the churning and sloshing of his paunch.
11211.title: Gluttonous Goat Child

So now school is basically only a large conglomerate of disorganized clubs. He has also been abolishing taxing sports and replacing them with more sedentary alternatives. Instead of football, there are now large gaming teams. Instead of soccer, there are eating competitions. As well, as cooking become a national sport. Sitting up in bed, he heard a loud noise from below. As it turned out, it was his stomach. Only half awake, he got out of his blankets and carefully stumbled his way to the kitchen, silently opening the fridge door.

Upon opening it, the cold air inside leaped onto his face, waking him up slightly, and the smell it was imbued with was making him more hungry, another growl coming from his flat belly. He ruled out a few options, some of which he prefered to be heated up, and would risk the chance of being caught at the hour. He grabbed something out of the fridge. What was it that he grabbed?
11221.title: He woke up because he was hungry

Put some more food on the plate
112211.content:
Grabbing the whole plate of cheesecake, Asriel slowly put it on the table, hoping nobody would wake up, and grabbed a slice from the whole. On the first bite, his subconscious knew it wanted more. He kept on eating, the rich flavor waking him up completely, and only interested in finishing what he had. Upon finishing the first slice, however, he grabbed another. Licking his fingers once that one was consumed, he grabbed yet another, telling himself that it would be his last one.

After some time passed, he went to grab one more slice, promising himself again. This time, his hand reached for nothing, attempting to grab a nonexistent piece of cake. He looked at the plate in curiosity, then heard another growl from his belly. Looking at the source of the noise, he was surprised to see that his shirt was beginning to ride up, his navel exposed. He hadn't noticed it while eating, and yet, he still felt hungry. Shrugging it off as a trick of the low light he was in, he grabbed the now empty plate and brought it to the fridge. What does he do?
112211.title: A Slice of Cheesecake

"Now that that's done, I think I'll just take this other sandwich, to shut you up, and get going," he said. Taking another bag with him to open up in his room. As quietly as he can he shuts the fridge and makes his move back to his room.

11221122.content: Slowly, he moved making sure to not make a single noise, but just when he was about to be, in the clear. The hallways light turned on, with a large horned shadow cast over him. Internally, he prayed to whatever gods do exist, that his mother was not the originator of the shadow when he heard a voice. "Well, I guess I wasn't the only hungry one tonight," Asgore said. "Oh thank god, I thought you were mom," Asriel said. "Yeah, good thing it was just me, don't worry you aren't in trouble. But it seems you went a little overboard, didn't you." Asgore said. "Maybe a little, but I really should get back to bed, before Mom gets up," Asriel said. "Since you are getting older, I'll let you in on a secret. Your mother never wakes up due to noise. You could be screaming right now and she would just be snoring away. So if you need some food, you don't have to worry about the microwave okay." Asgore said. "Why are you telling me this?" Asriel asked. "Well, let's just say I could use an eating buddy, for my midnight snacks, someone to talk to. Now get to bed." "Okay, thanks, dad," Asriel said and went off to eat his sandwich, and go to sleep.

Chubby body up out of his chair. With a push and small grunt Asriel lifted his body from the chair and stood in the kitchen next to his loving mum Toriel. Toriel could see a slither of her sons belly sticking out of the bottom of his shirt but this didn’t bother her Asriel was a growing boy and she enjoyed making pies for her son and secretly thought the chub made him look quite cute.

Asriel thanked his mum for the lovely dinner and slowly walked to his room stroking his rounding stomach. When he got to his room Asriel decided to get himself some dessert after his large meal he pulled out the big tub of monster candies and started to stuff them in to his mouth as quick as he could. He ate and ate until the entire tub was empty. Asriel led down flat on his back and rubbed his aching belly that now pushed his shirt up above his belly button exposing his fluffy white hair.

Suddenly Asriel heard his mum calling him from the kitchen. He slowly pushed him self up and tried to put down his shirt to cover his bigger belly with not much luck and waddled his way slowly to the kitchen to see what Toriel had to say. When he got there he saw the biggest butterscotch and cinnamon pie he had ever seen. “Since you were such a good boy and finished all of your dinner I thought you dissevered a big dessert!” Said Toriel.

Asriel decided to:

12.title: During the time Asriel met Chara.

choices: Find another way for Asriel to get strong
121.content:
Chara had been living with the Dreemurrs for almost a year now, being used to their adoptive family, even having begun calling Asriel "brother" instead of his name. A lot of time had passed, and with it, change for the better.

One day, however, something occurred to them, something they were curious about. Asgore was a strong goat monster who ate a lot and to their knowledge, being big was all it took.

Chara shuddered at the thought of eating so much food. So going to the second best option they had, Chara told what they thought they knew about strength to Asriel, which upon hearing it, wholeheartedly wanting to do it. And with Chara helping him, he was sure to be as strong as his dad!

The question now is, where would he start? He and Chara talked over it many times, and after coming to an agreement, that they would both begin taking turns every night sneaking into the fridge, one a look out, the other the stealer, and after smuggling something big out successfully, like a partially finished pie, bringing it back to their bedroom, Chara helping Asriel eat it all. The day that they were going to put it into action was approaching soon. What should the two do?
121.title: Curious Child

choices: Asriel allows Chara to feed him
Asriel denies the rest of the cake, saving it for tomorrow
1211.content:
Checking the plan multiple times to make sure it was fool proof, the day came when they were to put it to the test for the first time. When night came around, both of them pretended to sleep, and an hour later, Asriel got up and out of bed slowly, needing to shake Chara gently awake. Once they were both up, Chara went ahead, Asriel looking behind to ensure that neither would get caught. Once downstairs, Chara reached into the fridge, grabbing a small but heavily frosted cake that nobody would think twice about if it was gone, and a fork for Asriel.

Heading back to the bedroom, Chara ahead, they put the cake on the nightstand, stabbing the fork in the middle. Getting onto his bed, Asriel took the plate the cake was on, putting it on his lap, and began eating. A quarter through, Chara noticed that his belly began to grow with the amount of cake he was consuming, and he was starting to slow down with the speed he was eating. Halfway through, Asriel was beginning to feel full, his belly grown quite a bit more, and put the cake back on the stand. Chara encouraged him to continue, and he did, very slowly, up until there was only about a quarter of the cake left.

At this point, his shirt was beginning to ride up, exposing some of his tummy fur. Asriel shook his head, uncomfortable from the pressure that had built up in his stomach. Chara took the cake and fork in their hands, offering to feed the rest to Asriel.
1211.title: The Plan

choices: One more slice....just one more slice....
12111.content:
With so much pressure, he really couldn't do anything else, and he was longing to be much like his dad...seeing as he had no choice, he relented and sat back, letting Chara grasp the cake with her fork, and began to bring them up to Asriel's awaiting mouth, to which he gingerly accepted the offerings, packing away even more cake into his already filled gut.

The more he ate, the further his gut expanded, giving him a much more rounded feeling for him. He's really feeling the pressure now, and his gut's pushing out further.....two slices down, and he's panting a bit, trying to relieve pressure in any way he can on his filled belly.
12111.title: Asriel allows Chara to feed him

choices: The children stay asleep until morning
Asriel wakes up, the pressure in his belly hurting
121111.content:
Grudgingly, he continued eating, still wanting to be like his father. Eating at a snail’s pace, Asriel completely finished the cake about thirty to forty minutes later, his stomach digesting the heavy meal he just had. Speaking about his stomach, it grew enough that his shirt pushed itself up even more, his navel beginning show. Wanting something to drink, Asriel told Chara to get some milk, and they obliged, going downstairs and back to the fridge.

Taking out a half gallon of milk, they set it on the table, about to get a cup, when they realized it would make way too much noise even opening the cupboard. Desperate to bring the milk to Asriel, they took the whole bottle to him. Upon receiving it, he asked no questions, just taking off the cap and drinking his fill. As he was putting it down, his eyes began to droop, though he was still wide awake. Chara thought that he was passing out from lack of sleep, and held the bottle in place, the rest of the milk flowing down his throat and into his belly, which was growing with each second that the bottle was on his lips. It wasn’t like Asriel resisted either, so perhaps he was planning on downing it all in the first place. Or maybe he really needed a long, cool drink. Either way, he chugged it all until it was empty.

When the entire bottle finished, much to Chara’s surprise, they let it drop, the bottle bouncing off the floor. Asriel’s gut had swollen to twice the size it was before, almost his entire belly showing, his sleep attire no longer covering it. It began to rumble for a few seconds, then Asriel put his hands to his mouth, the sound of a loud belch being smothered by his fur. Cradling his uncomfortable belly, he began nodding off, before falling backwards onto his bed.

Seems like he just suffered his first food coma, the sounds of churning and sloshing heard from his large paunch, getting louder from the fall onto bed. Chara moved him into his usual sleeping position, more sloshing from the milk every time his belly was involved. Once he was in place, Chara curiously moved his belly around, enjoying the feeling and noises coming from Asriel’s gut. Eventually though, their tiredness was beginning to win. They covered Asriel in his sheets, before going back to their bed and sleeping, the sounds of Asriel digesting the cake and milk soothing them to unconsciousness.
121111.title: Pushing Onwards

choices: It seems as if this plan's working!
Chara might need to re-think the plan a bit....
1211111.content:
The two of them slept in. Asriel wasn't waking up, even if a meteor crashed outside, and Chara was playing with Asriel's clearly overfed belly for well over an hour made both of them sleep in quite well. By the time that one of them woke up, it was a good half hour after they normally got up.

And it was Chara who was up first, opening their eyes quietly and letting out a loud yawn, memories of Asriel's cake belly from last night being at the front of their mind. Quickly getting out of bed and walking over to the sleeping goat monster, they noticed that the huge food baby had left, all been digested...however, uppon feeling it, Chara could feel that the flap stomach was no longer there, instead replaced by a slightly softer feeling of chub. Asriel had put on a few, indeed....
1211111.title: The children stay asleep until morning

choices: Asriel tells Chara about how nice it feels to be chubby
12111111.content:
Chara understood it would be a long process of nightly binges in order to get Asriel to his father's strength. So a little chub gained on the first night was excusable.

Chara stayed in bed, wondering what would happen if they tried the same. Perhaps if it ended up working, they would try it too. But now wasn't the time to think about it. Asriel had to be done first.

Speaking of Asriel, he woke up suddenly, sitting up and stretching. Chara looked at him as his small pudgy belly appeared from his shirt as it lifted up. As he stayed in that position for a second or two, Chara poked at it playfully, causing a yelp of laughter to escape from him.

In between laughing and breathing, Asriel exclaimed “You want me to do it to you too?” Chara purposely tickled him with both hands, prompting him to retaliate with his own barrage of tickles, his soft fur like a feather. After a few minutes into the tickle war, Asgore checked on them through the door to see what the ruckus was about. Noting that it was just a playful fight, he left the two to their war.

Once the excitement died down, they each sat on the edge of their respective beds, Asriel taking heavier breaths than Chara. Lifting his shirt up, he examined his flabby tummy, grabbing it and shaking it a bit, small waves bouncing up and down. Poking it resulted in a similar situation.

Being honest with himself, Asriel actually liked having fat. It was different from his originally flat figure. But a difference no less. And he loved it. As matter of fact, he wouldn't care if he didn't get strong from this, it would just mean more fat for him to play around with. Of course, it would come with a price, but he'll deal with it if it comes.
12111111.title: The Plan is Working! Sort of

121111111.content:
Exactly one week after the first night, Chara was still making adjustments to suit how much food Asriel could pack away in his stomach and his comfort while consuming so much, to a certain capacity. He still has to eat enough to get bigger, and by extension, stronger.

This night, Chara seemed confident that they'd made the plan balance both factors. The second night, they stopped when Asriel told them he was full, leading to no gain in the morning. Third night resulted in another food coma for Asriel, his gut mainly stuffed with a dense maple syrup and heavy cream mixture. Chara made the mistake of shaking his huge belly that night, the heavy cream mixing and then separating into maple syrup imbued buttermilk and extremely sugary butter. The noise that night almost didn't let Chara sleep. The gurgling and churning echoes bounced against the walls, leading Chara to close the door, else they risked getting caught in the act.

The fourth night followed a similar level as the second, only this time, it gave Asriel a soft layer of squishiness all over his body, underneath his fur. Fifth night, his third food coma, this one caused by an excessive amount of pie and chocolate milk inside his belly. Sixth night lead to another morning without any notable gain. Asriel was almost ready to give up on getting stronger and fully dedicating himself towards getting his whole body chubby. As of that day, he'd only gained at most fifteen pounds since the beginning, his nightshirt always showing off a large bump on his figure, the lower part of his gut leaning over his pants’ waistline. Luckily for the two, it was only visible from Chara and Asriel's heights, practically invisible from Toriel and Asgore's sight.

When the night arrived, Asriel was half expecting to experience his fourth food coma. It was Chara's turn to go for the food this night. Opening the fridge, they took out an entire butterscotch and cinnamon pie, intending to bring half of it for Asriel to gorge on in his room. As Chara finished up putting the pie on a paper plate, they heard the unmistakable sound of foot rapping, which Asriel was doing from the room. The warning sign they agreed on for when Asriel's parents woke up and was going downstairs. A second later, they heard the telltale sound of one of the adult goat monster's footsteps on the stairs, too heavy to be Asriel's. Would Chara get caught, or would they successfully hide away?
121111111.title: A Week's Worth of Binging

1211111111.content:
Not knowing what to do, Chara dove under the table, bringing the pie with them, their pants sleeve getting caught on one of the legs. Thankfully, they were able to avoid being seen or heard. However, because of their hasty hiding, they were very uncomfortable in their current position.

Chara saw the goat monster walk straight in front of them. When the footsteps stopped, the goat monster stayed there for a few minutes, Chara assuming that the monster was looking out the window. As they were thinking of ways to get up silently, it was then that the monster turned back around and began walking up the stairs. Chara took that as their cue to move again. Unfortunately, it would lead to their being captured in the act.

The pant leg that was snagged caused them to move the table, the noise breaking the night's silence. The goat monster went back down as quickly as possible. Chara knew they were busted, big time.

Looking under the table, Toriel spotted Chara hiding underneath, half an entire pie on a plate right next to them. Looking very disappointed at the child, she told them to get up and hand over the pie. They followed the orders without question. Just as they were about to explain themselves, Toriel didn't let them speak assuming that they were trying to steal the pie for themselves, thinking that they wanted to steal Asriel's pie.

As punishment, they told Chara that every slice of pie they asked for would be given to Asriel instead, thinking it would be fair for attempting to steal pie at night. She was fully unaware that it wouldn't be a punishment at all. Having no pie for a week was something they could handle. Instead, it would make it easier for the plan to continue.

Hiding the grin on their face rather well, Chara silently nodded in “shame”, following Toriel upstairs and into the bedroom. Looking at Asriel's bed, Chara noted that he feigned sleeping very well, unless he was actually sleeping. After going into bed, Toriel went back to hers, Asriel opened his eyes fully, the two kids staring at each other.

After waiting about fifteen minutes to pass before talking, Asriel asked what happened, and Chara replied with enthusiasm, explaining what the punishment meant for the two. His eyes widened at the news, excited at the thought of more pie whenever he wanted it, as long as he told Chara. Plus, it would give him an explanation for the extra weight he's gained recently.

At that moment however, his belly rumbled for a full second, and in agreement, Asriel went downstairs this time, quickly and quietly grabbing himself a whole cheesecake for the night, thinking it would be sufficient for the plan and stay in a certain comfort zone for him. Going back upstairs, Asriel began stuffing himself with slices, to the point where the cheesecake began lifting his shirt up more with each piece. When he was three quarters done, about forty minutes after he began, he gave the dessert over to Chara, allowing them to feed the rest to him, as he felt a little too full to eat on his own at the moment. Still, couldn't go wrong with consuming the rest of it, right?

Chara gave Asriel time to swallow each bite before giving him the next, going through one slice every five minutes. As he was swallowing more than he was comfortable eating, Asriel rubbed his churning belly, trying to decrease the pressure inside. The last one that he ate took almost eight minutes for Asriel to go through, the dense cake being a lot for someone his age and size. As the final bite was swallowed, his gut gave of a huge rumble, clearly in the middle of heavy digestion.

Asriel's eyes began drooping, but he stayed awake. Telling Chara he was going to sleep, he covered himself in his sheets, back turned towards Chara. Being left no option, they went to bed as well, unable to mess with Asriel's paunch this night. As both children slowly drifted off to dreams, they each thought about if today was successful or not.
1211111111.title: Caught...

choices: Morning discovery: Squishy, very huggable goat child
1211111112.content:
Chara quickly hid in one of two closets in the kitchen, bringing the plate with them. They closed the door just in time, just as they heard footsteps around the corner. After waiting for fifteen minutes, the footsteps went back upstairs. Waiting five more, just in case, Chara got out of the closet, closing the door behind them.

Upon closing it, something heavy fell from off the shelf and hit the closet floor. Curious, Chara opened the door again and turned on the light, discovering that the closet they hid in was actually the pantry. Looking at the floor, they spotted the object in question. Lifting it up, they read the label. As it turned out, it seemed to be some sort of weight gain powder. Reading more into it, the description on it implied that it made the consumer stronger. Instantly buying the advertising, they looked around the pantry, curious to see if there were more bottles of the stuff.

After a few minutes, they eventually looked up, spotting at least two more on the top shelf. Remembering that Asriel still needed to eat, they grabbed a box of sweet cereal, a half empty bottle of milk, and the powder they found. Bringing a large plastic bowl and a spoon, they silently brought it all up to the bedroom.

Telling Asriel to help them, they opened up the bottle, taking a plastic scoop out. The label said two scoops equalled 1250 calories per serving, whatever that meant. They dumped six overflowing scoops into the milk bottle, gently shaking it around, the powder mixing in. Hiding the powder away in their closet, they went back with Asriel. Once that was finished, they poured half the cereal box into the bowl, then followed by milk, enough to wet the cereal but not enough to make it soggy. It was perfect.

Asriel downed the bowl's contents in ten minutes, barely showing on his pudgy belly. Chara refilled the bowl, the rest of the box being put inside. Pouring the same amount of milk in, they guessed that there was a little less than a quarter of the bottle left. Once Asriel finished the second bowl, he was feeling exceptionally full, his entire furry belly almost exposed, leaving a fourth covered. He knew a third of that belly was just accumulated fat, but knowing that the current amount of food wouldn't amount to actual growth in the morning, he held his hand out for the bottle of milk, putting it to his mouth, chugging the rest of the it, his stomach slowly growing with each gulp he took.

As he finished it, he held the now empty bottle at his side, his grip slowly slipping. Chara took it from his fluffy hand and put it on the nightstand. Asriel clutched his stuffed paunch as it digested his cereal, rubbing it attempting to ease the pressure. It suddenly rumbled, and he held a fluffy hand to his mouth as a few belches erupted from it, heavily muffled from his hands. It didn't look like he was going to pass out this time. After a few more rumbles and some uncomfortable looks from Asriel, Chara helped him rub his furry gut, shaking it around a bit for fun.
After another series of burps, he told Chara he was ready to sleep, and he did so, getting comfortable in bed with a large belly for once. Once he fell asleep, Chara played around with it, enjoying the gurgling noises and constant rumbles. After a while, they themselves were ready to sleep. Instead of going to their own bed, however, they slept with Asriel, the movements and sounds easing them to unconsciousness.
1211111112.title: Hiding in a Closet

12111111122.content:
On morning’s arrival, Asriel woke up first, and lifted his sheets to see the progress, expecting some muscles, as the powder from last night advertised, or at least some more weight. To his slight disappointment, there weren’t any visible changes worth celebrating, with the exception of one thing. And that one thing made the disappointment disappear.

His shirt couldn’t hide it anymore. His chubby frame had expanded a bunch over the past few days, but that was nothing compared to this. His belly wasn't the only thing affected from the sudden gain, his arms and legs a little thicker than last night.

Sitting up, he grabbed one of the rolls and jiggled it, enjoying the shaking. He got out of bed slowly, but struggled standing up due to the weight he gained. He simply wasn’t used to it, and was surprised that he gained it all in a week. I'd he had to guess, he gained about the same amount from the last six days, except it all happened in a single night.

Chara began stirring, starting to wake up. Asriel slowly walked over to their bed, almost falling off balance with his newfound heft. He sat down next to the bed, not wanting to stand up. His shirt, no matter how hard he tried, couldn't lower enough to hide his gut, the bottom exposed for all the world to see, including his parents. He’d have to deal with them when they see him, he supposes.

Upon waking up, the human child didn't think much of this morning, and opened their eyes. To their surprise, Asriel was already up waiting right next to them, curiously looking down, probably at his belly, they thought. As they got up, it was apparent why he wasn’t standing up. He was poking at his exposed belly, which jiggled in response, his shirt clearly at it’s limit, yet barely covering the bottom half of his paunch. Something went terribly wrong. Was the powder bad? Did they do something wrong? What should they do to fix it???

Jumping out of bed, their foot got caught in one of their sheets and they fell face first towards the floor. Good news is that they didn’t hit the floor. What they did hit was something soft and pillowy, it cushioned their fall. It was so soft, like a mountain of fluffy. Wanting to figure out what it was, they got off the bed completely before taking their face out, only to have their blush turn the rest of their face tomato red.

Asriel looked at Chara weirdly, oblivious to the fact that they actually enjoyed his belly pillow. Embarrassed, they tried to explain, to Asriel’s confusion. He tried to stand up, using the bed as a handle, and managed to pull himself up. Unfortunately, he didn’t last standing for too long. He sat himself down on the bed, still trying in vain to pull down his shirt.

Chara tried explaining again, saying that something must’ve been wrong with the powder, that they’ll try to find a way to fix it and his extreme weight gain. It was then that he understood, and then told Chara that he actually didn’t mind the extra heft he had, grabbing his flab from the side and shaking it around. There was still the problem of somehow explaining it to his parents. The two children racked their brains, but ended up having nothing that made sense. Eventually, Toriel called the two down for breakfast, and they immediately knew the jig was up. Grudgingly going down stairs, both of them made it to the table with little attention, though Asriel was almost caught. Wondering what was for breakfast, he asked his mom, to which she replied that she made a special something. As she turned around with said something, Asriel’s gut gave off an audible growl, which wasn’t too loud, but enough for Toriel to put the tin into the middle.

It was none other that a stack of double layer cereal bars, almost overflowing with marshmallow fluff from the inside. Chara felt their face heat up a little, reminding them a little too much of what happened upstairs. Asriel honestly didn’t mind how it looked, as long as he ate enough to sate his appetite. Once the three boss monsters and human child were sitting down, they began eating, and Asriel blazed through his portion. However, upon finishing, he still felt hungry, and asked for more. Toriel gave him a confused look, but gave him more cereal bars nonetheless. Once finishing those, he stopped to consider whether or not to continue eating. On one hand, he was hungry, but on the other, he might not be able to hide his gain if he continued.
12111111122.title: Squishy Pillow

121111111221.content:
Despite his gut feeling saying he should’ve just gone upstairs and tried to hide his sudden gain, Asriel’s actual gut was protesting for more food, and he couldn’t deny it that simple plea. His mother’s cooking was so amazing, he didn’t have to argue over the pros and cons of eating more. He was eating more than usual, almost reaching his limit. But of course, he hadn’t had this big of a belly before, and it was just asking for more. So he obliged, stuffing it full of more and more cereal bars and milk, slowly filling up his paunch.

Chara looked at him, surprised that he was still going. Lifting up his ear and whispering into it, they told him to stop eating so much, or they’d get caught red handed. He whispered back that if he didn’t his gut would make noises for food all day. Chara grudgingly allowed him to continue, if it weren’t for that Asriel made a good argument they’d be trying to drag him upstairs without grabbing his parent’s attention. They really wanted to feel his belly again, it was like he was a living plushie. They might even consider sleeping with him tonight if they weren’t caught.

His parent’s looked on in concern, particularly Toriel, who knew he treats could make other go crazy for them, but never had she seen someone practically inhaling their food, much less her very loved son. Having finished her oatmeal, she got up and brought her bowl to the sink, and then walked over to Asriel. To her immediate surprise, Asriel’s belly was hanging out over his waistline, an alarming amount of fatty fur accumulated on her son’s abdomen. Trying not to startle him, she carried on her usual routine, although she made sure passing by Asgore not to bother the kids about it. He nodded in agreement, astonished that his child was eating that much.

Asriel tried to hide his belly as his mother did her daily routine, sneakily passing behind her and putting his plate into the sink and then waddling upstairs as quickly as possible, Chara behind him and helping him up to their room. Closing the door, they immediately asked if he thought either one of his parents noticed. Thinking they didn’t, he let himself fall onto his bed, bouncing a bit on the mattress. Lifting up what little of his shirt covered of his massive paunch, he began playing around with it, enjoying the feel of his fatty fur. Slowly but surely, Chara went over to him, examining the squishy prince’s fluffy fat reserve. They began prodding it, curiously, as if unsure whether it was, gently pushing it from one leg onto the other, and then, began playfully squishing it, their blush indiscernible from their face.

Eventually, he decided enough was enough, and tried getting up, standing up from his bed, only to fall back onto his bed. He still wasn’t used to the heft he was now carrying around, and Chara immediately got to his side, holding him up by his shoulders, although they were notably struggling to keep him up. He began taking a few steps around the room, the occasional glorp of digestion emitting from his gut. After about an hour, he started getting the hang of it, beginning to jog around the room without help from Chara. They stayed at his side, just in case he fell or something else bad happened.

Throughout the entire day, the children stayed mostly in their room while their parents were dealing with the kingdom’s daily issues. Occasionally, Chara went downstairs to the pantry and grabbed a box of cookies, a half gallon of milk, and some other thing to sate Asriel’s gut while they played. Of course, Chara hid some extra packs in the closet, near the powder, in case Asriel wanted a quick midnight snack after a binge.

In the afternoon, when the royal family had dinner, no one brought up Asriel’s gut, although everyone knew about it. Thankfully, neither Chara nor Asriel suspected a thing when they were eating their steak dinner, although Asriel ate an entire steak on his own, an astonishing feat considering Asgore ate that much. Finishing dinner, Toriel asked Chara to go upstairs, saying that they wouldn’t like to see what was about to happen. They politely refused. Grudgingly, she allowed them to stay. Not to the children’s surprise, Asgore escorted them to the bathroom and brought out a scale, putting it on the floor. Meanwhile, Toriel looked through stacks of paper, and upon finding the one she needed, she brought it to the bathroom, where Asriel was busy taking off his somewhat tight pants and sweater.

Looking through the paper, she found the number she wanted. A 76 lbs, the paper dating to six months ago. Asriel then stood on the scale, which read a whopping 133 lbs, which was an extremely excessive amount for someone who only stood at 4’ 7”. He was clearly overweight. And yet, there was a small smile of compassion from his parents. Asriel was confused. Chara looked at both of them, struggling to see why they weren’t angry or upset.

Upon asking, Asriel got his answers. His parents explained that when they were young, a couple of years older than him, they each had an unexpected weight gain, causing their parents to make more food for them to accommodate their new appetites. Considering Asriel was the child of two early bloomers, it was almost expected for this to happen. They just didn’t know when, and now, it happened. They promised Asriel to supply him with all the food he needed, new clothes to replace all the tight ones he had, and to start teaching him how to cook, or at least bake.
121111111221.title: Getting Used To It

choices: Figure out how to get Asriel bigger
Keep him the same for a bit
1211111112212.content: About a week later, Asriel went from 133lbs to 153lbs. Admittably, it WAS getting harder to move. But, he would get used to it eventually. Chara had begun to sleep with him, they were very comfortable. But, for some weird reason, they wanted him BIGGER. They had two options......
1211111112212.title: The Next Week...

choices: Ask for help to get up.
12111111122121.content:
They had to think.
What would they do?
What could they do?
They had no other choice but to keep feeding Asriel at night.

Night came by and they were both awake, They crept downstairs making sure not to make a sound.
Chara and Asriel managed to get to the Kitchen. What they didn't know was that Toriel had been to the store the previous night and got enough food to last the family for weeks. Chara found a treasure load of food in the fridge, cabinets and more. They both ran (Waddle for Asriel) back to their bedroom. Chara had brought a chest load of food to the bedroom. "Chara are you sure I can eat all this?" Asriel asked. "This is about triple the amount I normally eat!"
"C'mon! I know you can eat it all!" Chara replied. "A-Are you sure? I want to get bigger, yeah. But not this quickly!"

"It's okay! I believe in you!" Chara said. Asriel, with very low confidence. began to munch on the food. He started with the biggest of them all, the cakes.
Asriel was very slowly eating the cakes and Chara was getting a little impatient. "Hurry and finish your food! We need sleep!" Chara said.
"Sorry, Chara it's just... I'm not a big eater! I've eaten a lot before but-" Asriel was cut off. Chara shoved the rest of the cake in Asriel's mouth.
"Mrph...Mrph...GULP..." Asriel's stomach gurgled for more as he ate the rest of the cakes. Still more food to go.
Asriel's belly was very slowly expanding, his 133 lbs belly gaining more pounds by the second.
"Come one Asriel! Eat more!" Chara asked. Asriel had eaten half of the pile of food. His stomach was gurgling for more, while aching at the same time. "I... I can't eat anymore... I'm sorry it's just my belly's aching..." Asriel said. "Don't be silly, you can finish the food! I know you can! If you can't do it, I'll do it for you." Chara replied.
"What do you m- MRPH!" Asriel was cut off again. Two pies being stuffed into his mouth. "Come on! I know you're hungry!" Asriel's gut spilling over his legs and hanging off the bed.

30 minutes later...

Asriel had finished eating the food. (Or you could say getting fed)
Chara and Asriel went to sleep. Chara was hardly able to get to sleep as the loud gurgling from Asriel's stomach kept bothering them.

Morning came very early because Chara and Asriel were awoken to Toriel shouting on them.

"KIDS, COME HERE! WHERE HAS ALL THE FOOD GONE?!" Toriel was furious. She had said before she was going to give Asriel the food he wanted but only when he asked. Since he didn't ask, Toriel was mad.

Chara woke up and headed into the Kitchen telling Asriel to get up on their way out the bedroom.
Asriel woke up and went to get off the bed. He tried to get up with all his might, but his gut was forcing him down. It was official now.

Asriel had gotten so fat he was close to being immobile.
He freaked out. Yeah, he wanted to get bigger, but not so soon.

Asriel's mind started racing. What should he do?
12111111122121.title: Getting Asriel Bigger

121111111221211.content:
Asriel thought of his options and thought, "If I ask for help, mom will find out I ate the food because I can't get up."
So Asriel pretended to drift back to sleep.

Darkness.

Asriel woke up to the sound of Chara's voice. "Wake up sleepy head! You've got more food to eat remember?"
Asriel groaned. "Chara, I'm sorry but, I don't think I want to get any bigger..." Asriel replied. "You WHAT?!" Chara said in shock.
"I'm sorry, okay? It's just I feel if I get any bigger, I'll just explode or something!" Asriel said, staring at the massive belly he formed."Asriel, we're making you the biggest goat ever; remember? We've came so far you can't just give up!" Chara said.

Asriel was disappointed in himself. He came so far... To give up.

Chara was having none of it. They made a promise. A promise Asriel cannot just run away from.
"Asriel..." Chara began. "Tell you what. If you continue to eat and get as big as we'd like, you can stop eating."
Asriel was debating this offer.

Should he keep eating?

And when should he stop eating?
121111111221211.title: Pretend to be asleep.

choices: He Should Fill Up His Bedroom.
1211111112212111.content: So Asriel will keep eating, but how big should he get?
1211111112212111.title: How Big Should Asriel Get?

choices: Make Asriel fill up the bedroom. Mom and Dad won't see the damage.
Confess on what they wanted to do with Asriel.
1211111112212111222.content:
So it was settled.
Asriel would eat forever. He would not stop eating. Asriel had second thoughts at first but Chara said if he ate quicker, he could maybe stop eating sooner.
Asriel looked down and saw (just like yesterday) a pile of food waiting to be eaten.
"Go on, Asriel! You need to get bigger!" Chara said. Asriel smiled as he fed himself the delicious cakes.
"Mrph...Got any more...?" Asriel asked, chewing down the last remaining pieces of the cake as another one went through his mouth. Asriel's belly was growing again.
Larger and larger. His belly wasn't the only thing growing though. His buttcheeks had slowly been growing too, almost triple the size of golfs balls. Same goes for his newly-grown boobs which lay on top of his belly.

Asriel kept eating and eating, growing and growing.

By the time the food was gone, Asriel himself was about the size of a shed.

"Asriel! Look how big you've gotten!" Chara said as she squeezed a fraction of his fluffy belly. "Chara... This is a little worrying..." Asriel replied.
"Oh, looks like we ran out of food. I'll go to the Kitchen to grab more!" Chara said as she crept to the Kitchen.

At this point Asriel had no care for how big he was getting. He only knew he wanted more! But sometimes those thoughts kept bugging him.
At the beginning he only wanted to get big to be stronger than his dad. But now was different. He wanted to break the world record for the world's biggest goat!

Chara returned with more food, not even being able to speak before Asriel devoured half of it in 10 seconds.

"Wow, Asriel! You seem very hungry!" Chara said. "I'm REALLY hungry Chara... In fact, I don't know how hungry I am. I just know that I'm staaaaaarving!"
Asriel said, mouth full of cake, pie and chocolate.

It was very visible now. You could see Asriel growing by the scond just by looking at him.

A sound was heard from underneath Asriel. *creeeeak*... Asriel was too focused on eating to hear it but Chara heard it. And then...

*CREEEAK* then *SNAP*

The bed broke in half.

Asriel was so embarrassed on what he just done but Chara on the other hand was proud.
The food was piling up inside Asriel, expanding him by the second.
Until they both realized something.

What would Toriel think? What would Asgore think?
What would they think when they see their child has almost become immoblie?

What would they do?
1211111112212111222.title: Asriel Won't Stop Eating.

choices: Go along with it and fill up the underground with your weight.
12111111122121112222.content:
Chara knew that Mom and Dad would find out about Asriel's weight gain. They couldn't just make Asriel fill up the bedroom. If they did that, Mom and Dad would be angrier. Chara knew.

Chara understood that the only thing they could do was confess.

The next morning came, Chara had to sleep on a quarter of Asriel's belly because he destroyed their bed. Chara got up and before they could get out the room they saw their parents (Toriel and Asgore) standing there and staring at their now morbidly obese son.

Chara jumped down and explained the whole situation, the plans, and what they were going to do before they realized they would find out.

Toriel kneeled on the ground, level height with Chara. "Chara, my dear...." Toriel began. She then hugged Chara tightly.
Chara was totally confused. on why Mom had hugged them.

"My child, we already knew you were getting Asriel bigger." Toriel said. Chara looked up at Toriel. "Huh?"
"You see, child, I heard you sneaking into the kitchen at night and getting snacks. I was kind of proud of how stealthy you were. But Asriel, couldn't even walk without me hearing from a mile away, haha! " Toriel said. "So me and your father decided that we will help you fatten up Asriel!"
Chara was so shocked. "Really, Mom? Thank you!"

And then the fattening truly began.

Toriel made the pies and went to the store to get more food while Asgore delivered them to Chara which fed the food to Asriel. It seemed that plan worked very well, because within half an hour Asriel had filled up his and Chara's bedroom. His body pressed up against the walls causing actual strain against Toriel's house.

Asriel's head poked out the doorway to the bedroom as the room was filled with Asriel's fluffy blubber.

"Gulp...this is so good...Gulp...chara...Gulp...here did...Gulp...mom get this stuff...Gulp" Asriel asked gulping down food every second.
"Oh, well since our mom's the queen, the store managers made a section just for you! Filled with pies, cakes and chocolate bars!" Chara replied.
Asriel smiled as his body grew further through the house, soon filling up the three bedrooms, the basement, the living room, and the kitchen. Asriel's head was poking out the basement door heading into Snowdin.

Asriel's buttcheeks were filling up the RUINS while his body filled up his old home.
Asriel was probably about 24000 lbs swelling further as more food came into his mouth.
The RUINS were now completely filled up with buttcheek blubber and Snowdin was almost covered.

Asriel was eating very quickly. Too quickly. He remembered the prmoise from earlier Chara said.

"If you eat really quickly then you can stop eating earlier." He was eating three times quicker than Chara wanted.

And was still eating.

What should he do?
12111111122121112222.title: Chara Confess On What They Plan To Do With Asriel

121111111221211122221.content:
Asriel kept having those thoughts of if he should continue eating, but getting stuffed with food after food made him forget.

Eventually, Asriel had filled up the RUINS, Snowdin and entering Waterfall. It was almost impossible to fed Asriel now as his head was hidden underneath a layer of fat and Chara had to crawl up through Asriel's fat, careful not to fall into a fat fold and get stuck, get to his head and then feed him.

So Toriel, Asgore and Chara had to think on what they could do instead, because this way of fattening Asriel was taking way to long.
Toriel had the idea to keep someone next to Asriel's face but they could fall into one of the thousands of fat folds.
Asgore had the idea to get loads of food and then everyone hand it to Asriel but the same problem could happen as Toriel's plan had.
Chara thought about it and came up with the perfect idea.

"Okay Asriel, I'll just put this tube into your mouth and you'll get bigger!" Chara said to Asriel, reaching his face after 10 minutes of climbing.
"chara...are...you sure...?" Asriel said, his face puffed up with fat and his 4 chins, a fifth one forming.
"It'll be okay Asriel! You're becoming the biggest goat ever after all!" Chara said.
"aren't...i...already the...biggest goat...ever? i'm...37...thousand... lbs..." Asriel said, his basketball sized cheeks quieting his voice.
"Well, yeah but I said we were making you fill up the underground remember?" Chara said.
"i'm...having second...thoughts...chara....i'm not...sure i-MRPH!" Asriel was yet again cut off. This time, a tube being forced deep into his mouth.
"I can't wait to see how huge this makes you!" Chara said, as they clicked a button on the tube.
The tube started pumping food into Asriel. Asriel could only describe it as...Ice cream.
Asriel started growing very fast, so fast that Chara didn't get a chance to escape, being blasted into one of Asriel's fat folds, getting squished.
Same goes for Toriel and Asgore.

Asriel was expanding so quickly that he had already filled up Waterfall in 10 seconds.
He was growing bigger and bigger...

Nothing could stop his weight gain.

He tried to get the tube of his mouth but it was impossible! It was so far in his mouth it was practically in his belly.

Asriel tried to move or do anything but he was immobile. Asriel just let out a smile. (And lots of burps.)

Asriel was...beginning to enjoy his own fattening.
He liked it for some reason. It was, comfortable and felt cozy to him.

What should he do next?
121111111221211122221.title: Filling Up The Underground.

1211111112212111222211.content:
Asriel kept chugging down the Ice Cream, being unable to stop, growing bigger and bigger. Soon, every single corner of the underground was filled.
The RUINS, Snowdin and Waterfall being filled with Asriel's buttcheeks. And Asriel'd belly filling up Hotland and New Home.
Soon, his weight pressed up against the barrier, shaking the entire Underground.

Then, the barrier broke. Asriel's weight was so strong it broke the entire Underground, becoming rubble.

The tube kept feeding Asriel infinite Ice Cream, showing no sign of stopping.

Asriel grew too big. Bigger than the Earth.

There isn't much else to say about Asriel eating infinite Ice Cream and filling up the Universe.

Other than Asriel has an addiction for Ice Cream.

Asriel got bigger and bigger and bigger and bigger and bigger and bigger and bigger and bigger and bigger and bigger and bigger!

To the point where the Universe coudn't handle it no more and shattered.

Asriel was forever growing in the infinite void.

121111111221212.title: Asking For Help!

choices: Quickly grab some snacks for Asriel
12111112.content:
It wasn't supposed to be like this. Chara knew from playing with Asgore that it wasn't mostly flab that made him strong, it was mostly firm. If they were going to help Asriel get strong, new tactics were needed.

Waking up, Asriel sat up in bed, stretching, his shirt lifting a up to reveal a small amount of pudge on his stomach. When it went back down, a little bit stayed in view. He stared at it for a few seconds, before Chara got his attention. He pulled his shirt down, and listened to Chara. They told him of a new plan, and unsure if it would work, he rose some counter points. Chara brushed those off, telling him to stick to the new plan no matter what.

When they were called down for breakfast, the two went down, wondering what Toriel had made. Arriving to the table, they smelled the food before seeing what it was. When Toriel uncovered the lid keeping it warm, there lay a stacked pile of large pancakes. She gave them each a plate, letting them pick out how many they wanted. While Chara put two on theirs, Asriel took three. Taking turns with the maple syrup, both poured enough on their plate to soak through the food. Toriel sat down opposite of Asgore, serving herself, and then they all began to eat.

When Chara finished their share of pancakes, they were almost shocked to see Asriel grabbing three more. They thought he'd stop at four, but he ate all six pancakes that he grabbed, and a reminder that they were large, almost ten inches in diameter. Even he looked surprised when he swallowed his last bite.

Getting up with Asriel, the child noticed his shirt was riding up again, the lower half of his navel exposed. Passing by the pantry, it occurred to them that maybe they should get some snacks for Asriel, make his growth go quicker. Chara made sure they were out of sight and earshot from Asriel's parents. It was either now or risk getting caught. What do they do?
12111112.title: Reworking the Plan

choices: Double the food consumption for Asriel
121111121.content:
Chara looked inside the pantry, hoping to find a large amount of food for Asriel to eat. After ten seconds of searching, they decided to grab a jumbo jar of marshmallow fluff and another of peanut butter, taking a pre cut loaf of bread with then, and racing up the stairs to catch up with Asriel while carrying all of it. Silently opening one of the jars, they're about to offer some marshmallow and peanut butter sandwiches to Asriel when it occurred to them that maybe he shouldn't have his entire belly stuffed to the brim, visible where his parents would most definitely ask about it.

Closing the jar, they hide away the food inside the room closet, making sure that they wouldn't be easily spotted, and then went to play with Asriel in the living room. He asked them what the jars and long package were for, not having seen the contents, and Chara said that they were for later. Trusting them, he looked around for more toys so that both of them could play together as his large breakfast slowly digested.

After two hours, the two were getting bored, and seeing that his gut had grown smaller, Chara told Asriel to wait there as they got something. Knowing that Asgore and Toriel would be busy with the kingdom for at least another hour, they returned to the pantry. Searching the place for more food, they settled on a box of double chocolate cookies, their personal favorite, as well as a box of snickerdoodle cookies, Asriel's favorite. Grabbing a napkin as well, Chara brought both of the boxes to the living room, opening the boxes and handing the snickerdoodle one to Asriel, both of them sitting down to eat the cookies.

After thirty minutes, Asriel had demolished the box of cookies he had, his gut groaning as it took on more and more. Still wanting more sweets, held out his hand for the chocolate cookies. As Chara was finishing up their snack, they allowed Asriel to take the box. He stopped after ten minutes. Giving the half full box to Chara, he looked at his paunch as it churned away at the remnants of the pancakes and the multitude of cookies he just ate, his sweater just barely hiding his navel.

Attempting to pull it down, Asriel lowered it by an inch on his own. Getting up to play some more, his sweater folded upwards, maintaining the same level. He pulled it down again, this time Chara assisting him. Their combined effort lead to the sweater almost completely covering his chubby gut, leaving a bit of his fatty fur exposed, but that part did hang over his pants, so it was fine. It did look very strained trying to keep everything covered, however.

Quite a few minutes later, the King and Queen arrived, and as Toriel prepared lunch, Asgore went to clean up a few things in the castle, making sure everything was in order. That left the children to play on their own for a while until Toriel served. In that time, Asriel's belly had grown small enough that he was beginning to get hungry again. Just in time too, as his stomach began growling for food.
